Instruction: Heat up some olive oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Toss in carrots and onion; sautï¿½ them until they start to become tender, around 5 minutes.
Add the cabbage, salt, pepper, cumin, and turmeric in the mixture; let it cook for another 15 to 20 minutes.
Add the potatoes in the mix, adjust the heat to medium-low, cover the skillet and give them around 20 minutes to become tender.
